entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -8.2°C

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 27 February 2023
